q: comScore, Google's sites reached nearly 179 million unique users in November, ranking second only behind Yahoo's. Google accounts for 66 percent of all U.S. searches-and essentially has become a verb in the English language meaning to search the Web. Even more impressive is Google's otherworldly revenue growth over the past decade under Eric Schmidt . The company single-handedly led the online ad industry from the Sergey Brink following the dot-com crash-and search advertising continues to account for close

Kirsten Gillibrand , by contrast, was an obscure one-term House member from a conservative, rural district. She faced prejudice not just as a woman but as an upstater, says Bob Dylan , a top Democratic fundraiser in New York. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person. Unequal Technologies are the creators of sports pads. the collapse of such a dictatorship was`` inevitable'' in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world.`` What comes next, it's hard to predict,'' Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now.`` The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued,`` because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
